item.title: Iso8583 message structure
item.author: nayibor@gmail.com (Nuku Ameyibor)
item.description: alloha. at last i have been able to get my lazy behind to write a blog post on this. About time :). This will be the first in a series about parsing iso8583 financial messages using erlang. we will get to know about iso8583 and the message structure receiving iso 8583 messages over the wire using erlang tcp server and parsing the message . parsing those messages in various formats(text(acii),binary,custom format).
